data.title: This is why Gajak is a must have sweet in winter
meta_keywords: why gajak is a must in winter
data.meta_description: Come winter and we all start having the crispy Gajak, which is traditionally made with peanut and jaggery. It’s the winter favourite sweet that’s not just delicious but provides numerous health benefits as well. Sometimes sesame seeds are also added to it to increase the nutrition, while it provides a powerhouse of warmth, aiding in maintaining body temperature during the cold season. Rich in essential nutrients, sesame seeds contribute to bone health and skin nourishment, while jaggery offers iron, boosting energy levels. Additionally, the combination of these ingredients helps in alleviating winter-related ailments and provides a natural source of antioxidants. Gajak not only satisfies sweet cravings but also serves as a nutritious treat, making it a wholesome and flavorful choice to combat the winter chill. Here are a few reasons why it’s a must have sweet in winter. (Images courtesy: Canva)
data.text:
Come winter and we all start having the crispy Gajak, which is traditionally made with peanut and jaggery. It’s the winter favourite sweet that’s not just delicious but provides numerous health benefits as well. Sometimes sesame seeds are also added to it to increase the nutrition, while it provides a powerhouse of warmth, aiding in maintaining body temperature during the cold season. Rich in essential nutrients, sesame seeds contribute to bone health and skin nourishment, while jaggery offers iron, boosting energy levels. Additionally, the combination of these ingredients helps in alleviating winter-related ailments and provides a natural source of antioxidants. Gajak not only satisfies sweet cravings but also serves as a nutritious treat, making it a wholesome and flavorful choice to combat the winter chill. Here are a few reasons why it’s a must have sweet in winter.

(Images courtesy: Canva)

The main ingredient of Gajak is jaggery, which not only tastes well but is good for bones as well. It is a known fact that jaggery is rich in calcium, which is very beneficial for bones. Also, when sesame seeds are added to Gajak, it increases the calcium content, which is essential for the bone strength.

With its key ingredients, sesame seeds and jaggery, Gajak becomes a rich source of iron, which is crucial for haemoglobin production, aiding in the prevention of anaemia. Consuming Gajak regularly during the winter months can be a delightful way to boost iron levels, supporting overall well-being and combating the risk of anaemia.

Gajak serves as an energy-packed winter indulgence, as its made from sesame seeds, jaggery and peanuts. While sesame seeds are abundant in nutrients like magnesium and zinc, known to combat fatigue and enhance energy levels. Jaggery is a natural sweetener, which provides a quick energy boost. Together, these elements not only acts as an effective remedy against fatigue, but makes it a wholesome choice for those seeking a revitalizing winter snack.

Gajak is said to be rich in zinc and antioxidants, as it is made of jaggery and sesame seeds. Zinc is renowned for its immune-boosting properties, while antioxidants play a vital role in supporting overall health. Enjoying Gajak as a winter treat may fortify the body's defenses, making it a flavourful and nutritious addition to enhance immune function during the colder months.

The sesame seeds used in Gajak are a good source of dietary fibre, which promotes healthy digestion and preventing constipation. Additionally, jaggery acts as a natural laxative, easing bowel movements. Incorporating Gajak into your winter diet not only satisfies your sweet cravings but also contributes to digestive well-being, providing a delicious solution to alleviate constipation.
